rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C115304

definition: A grouping of observations within the Functional Tests domain.
name: Category of Functional Test

terms.definition: 4 Stair Ascend (McDonald CM, Henricson EK, Abresch RT, et al. The 6-minute walk test and other clinical endpoints in duchenne muscular dystrophy: reliability, concurrent validity, and minimal clinically important differences from a multicenter study. Muscle Nerve. 2013;48(3):357-68.).
terms.preferredTerm: Four Stair Ascend Test Functional Test

terms.definition: Descend 4 Stairs (McDonald CM, Henricson EK, Abresch RT, et al. The 6-minute walk test and other clinical endpoints in duchenne muscular dystrophy: reliability, concurrent validity, and minimal clinically important differences from a multicenter study. Muscle Nerve. 2013;48(3):357-68.).
terms.preferredTerm: Four Stair Descend Test Functional Test

terms.definition: The Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative's (ADNI) version of the Auditory Verbal Learning Test (AVLT Version A) modified from Rey A. L'examen clinique en psychologie [Clinical tests in psychology]. Paris: Presses Universitaires de France; 1964.
terms.preferredTerm: Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative Auditory Verbal Learning Test Functional Test

terms.definition: Auditory Verbal Learning Test (AVLT-Rey) (Modified from Rey A. L'examen clinique en psychologie [Clinical tests in psychology]. Paris: Presses Universitaires de France; 1964. Test-Retest Reliability of a New Form of Auditory Verbal Learning Test (AVLT); Archives of Clinical Neuropsycology, Vol. 9, No. 4, pp. 303-316, 1994. Performance of Healthy Subjects and Patients with Resection from the Anterior Temporal Lobe on Matched Tests of Verbal and Visuoperceptual Learning; Journal of Clinical and Experimental Neuropsychology 1996, Vol. 18, No. 3, pp. 416-430).
terms.preferredTerm: Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Functional Test

terms.definition: Brief Assessment of Cognition in Schizophrenia (BACS) (Richard Keefe, PhD, Copyright 1999 Duke University Medical Center, Licenses available through Neurocog Trials, Inc.).
terms.preferredTerm: Brief Assessment of Cognition in Schizophrenia Functional Test

terms.definition: Controlled Oral Word Association Test (COWAT) (Benton, A.L., Hamsher, K., & Sivan, A.B. (1994). Multilingual Aphasia Examination (3rd ed.). Iowa City, IA: AJA Associates).
terms.preferredTerm: Controlled Oral Word Association Test

terms.definition: Emotion Recognition (Ekman P, Friesen WV. Measuring facial movement. Environmental Psychology and Nonverbal Behavior. 1976;1(1):56-75).
terms.preferredTerm: Emotion Recognition Test Functional Test

terms.definition: Hauser Ambulation Index (AI) (Hauser SL, Dawson DM, Lehrich JR, Beal MF, Kevy SV, Propper RD, Mills JA, Weiner HL. Intensive immunosuppression in progressive multiple sclerosis. A randomized, three-arm study of high-dose intravenous cyclophosphamide, plasma exchange, and ACTH. N Engl J Med. 1983 Jan 27;308(4):173-80).
terms.preferredTerm: Hauser Ambulation Index Functional Test

terms.definition: Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) (MMSE Copyright 1975, 1998, 2001 by MiniMental, LLC All rights reserved. Published 2001 by Psychological Assessment Resources, Inc. May not be reproduced in whole or in part in any form or by any means without written permission of Psychological Assessment Resources, Inc.).
terms.preferredTerm: Mini-Mental Status Exam

terms.definition: Mini-Mental State Examination 2 Standard Version (MMSE-2 STANDARD VERSION) (MMSE-2 Copyright 2010 by Mini Mental, LLC. All rights reserved. Published 2010 by Psychological Assessment Resources, Inc (PAR). May not be reproduced in whole or in part in any form or by any means without written permission of Psychological Assessment Resources, Inc.).
terms.preferredTerm: Mini-Mental State Examination 2 Standard Version Functional Test

terms.definition: Montreal Cognitive Assessment (MoCA) (Copyright Z. Nasreddine MD. Ziad S. Nasreddine, Natalie A. Phillips, Valerie Bedirian, Simon Charbonneau, Victor Whitehead, Isabelle Collin, Jeffrey L. Cummings and Howard Chertkow. The Montreal Cognitive Assessment, MoCA: A Brief Screening Tool For Mild Cognitive Impairment. J Am Geriatr Soc. 2005 Apr;53(4):695-9).
terms.preferredTerm: Montreal Cognitive Assessment Functional Test

terms.definition: Nine-Hole Peg Test (NHPT) (Copyright 2001, National Multiple Sclerosis Society).
terms.preferredTerm: Nine-Hole Peg Functional Test

terms.definition: Paced Tapping (Rowe KC, Paulsen JS, Langbehn DR, et al. Self-paced timing detects and tracks change in prodromal Huntington disease. Neuropsychology. 2010;24(4):435-442).
terms.preferredTerm: Paced Tapping Test Functional Test

terms.definition: Paced Auditory Serial Addition Test (PASAT) (Copyright 2001, National Multiple Sclerosis Society).
terms.preferredTerm: Paced Auditory Serial Addition Functional Test

terms.definition: Performance of the Upper Limb Module for DMD Version 1.2 (PUL V1.2) (Mayhew A, Mazzone ES, Eagle M, et al. (2013). Development of the Performance of the Upper Limb module for Duchenne muscular dystrophy. Dev Med Child Neurol; 55:1038-45).
terms.preferredTerm: Performance of the Upper Limb Module for DMD 1.2 Functional Test

terms.definition: Performance of the Upper Limb Module for DMD Version 2.0 (PUL V2.0) (Mayhew A, Mazzone ES, Eagle M, et al. (2013). Development of the Performance of the Upper Limb module for Duchenne muscular dystrophy. Dev Med Child Neurol; 55:1038-45).
terms.preferredTerm: Performance of the Upper Limb Module for DMD 2.0 Functional Test

terms.definition: Rising From Floor (McDonald CM, Henricson EK, Abresch RT, et al. The 6-minute walk test and other clinical endpoints in duchenne muscular dystrophy: reliability, concurrent validity, and minimal clinically important differences from a multicenter study. Muscle Nerve. 2013;48(3):357-68.).
terms.preferredTerm: Rising From Floor Test Functional Test

terms.definition: Symbol Digit Modalities Test (SDMT) (Copyright 1973 by Western Psychological Services).
terms.preferredTerm: Symbol Digit Modalities Functional Test

terms.definition: 6 Minute Walk Test (6MWT) (Goldman MD, Marrie RA, Cohen JA. Evaluation of the six-minute walk in multiple sclerosis subjects and healthy controls. Multiple Sclerosis 2008; 14: 383-390).
terms.preferredTerm: 6 Minute Walk Functional Test

terms.definition: Timed 25-Foot Walk (T25FW) (Copyright 2001, National Multiple Sclerosis Society).
terms.preferredTerm: Timed 25-Foot Walk Functional Test

terms.definition: Ten Meter Walk/Run (McDonald CM, Henricson EK, Abresch RT, et al. The 6-minute walk test and other clinical endpoints in duchenne muscular dystrophy: reliability, concurrent validity, and minimal clinically important differences from a multicenter study. Muscle Nerve. 2013;48(3):357-68.).
terms.preferredTerm: Ten Meter Walk/Run Test Functional Test

terms.definition: Trail Making Test (TMT) [(Copyright Owner: Dr. Jim Hom, The Neuropsychology Center, 500 N. Central Expressway, Suite 272, Plano TX 75074-6877. Ph: 469-429-8890, www.neuropsych.com.)(Manual: Army Individual Test. War Department, The Adjutant General's Office, 1944.)(Reitan RM. The Relation of the Trail Making Test to Organic Brain Damage; Journal of Consulting Psychology 1955 Oct 19(5):393-4.)(Reitan R.M. (1958). The validity of the Trail Making Test as an indicator of organic brain damage; Perceptual and Motor Skills, 8, 271-276.)].
terms.preferredTerm: Trail Making Test

terms.definition: Timed Up and Go (TUG) (Podsiadlo D, Richardson S. The Timed 'Up & Go': a test of basic functional mobility for frail elderly persons. J Am Geriatr Soc. 1991; 39:142-148).
terms.preferredTerm: Timed Up and Go Functional Test
